channel.title: I was only trying to help... then this happened
channel.description:
Hello,
This evening I was at the grand exchange when some guy comes up to me asking if I could buy him 500 bronze minotaur pouches at 75k each and he would buy them off me because he hit limit. He gave me one to try and sell at mid ge price which was 1k something and I got 75k coins off the ge from the offer. I then accepted to help him and after they bought he just kind of ran off and now I am stuck with 800k worth of crap. THIS is what I get for trying to be a helpful person? Seriously, the rs community has gone downhill.
I don't know what to do. I don't want to just sell these for the market price and be out big money... but I cant sell them back from what i got them for.

item.title: I was only trying to help... then this happened
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

Idk if they ever fixed Barrows, but safespotting barrows with magic or range against barrows is EASY EASY EASY CASH.

Read full topic
item.source: I was only trying to help... then this happened

item.title: I was only trying to help... then this happened
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

He was selling his own item. Fortunately for you, he is probably going to continue scamming people this way. What you can do is put those pouches back in the GE for 70k each. When he tries to scam others into buying his for 75k, they will automatically purchase from you first. This might take a few days, but I’ve made over 500m exploiting scammers’ methods.

Read full topic
item.source: I was only trying to help... then this happened

item.title: I was only trying to help... then this happened
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

You sir got scammed, never buy an item that doesn’t seem like it should buy for that price.

Read full topic

item.title: I was only trying to help... then this happened
item.dc:creator: @ghostly150 ghostly150
item.description:
@ghostly150 wrote:

so then i guess i should just go ahead and sell these at market for the 800k they are actually worth and take your advice and use my skills to work back up.

Read full topic

item.title: I was only trying to help... then this happened
item.dc:creator: @ghostly150 ghostly150
item.description:
@ghostly150 wrote:

any suggestions?

i can think of my current income but it would take 35 weeks if not more to get back up to where i was. It’s my miscellania kingdom.

Read full topic
item.source: I was only trying to help... then this happened

item.title: I was only trying to help... then this happened
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

800k is nothing nowadays, so no it isn’t the end. You could make back that money and some to spare fairly easily.

Read full topic

Is this the end of my runescape career?

Read full topic
